video.title: Totally Spies!
video.synopsis: These clever girls aren't just shopaholic teens. After school, they're agents for a secret organization where villains run amok and cool gadgets rule!

episodes.synopsis: When pop star Ricky Mathis' fans start going berserk, the spies tour undercover as his opening act to get to the bottom of things.
episodes.title: A Thing for Musicians

episodes.synopsis: Clover is abducted after she goes undercover as the queen of Lyrobia. When Sam and Alex try to rescue her, they make a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Queen for a Day

episodes.synopsis: Tired of Jerry watching over their every move, the girls welcome new WOOHP leader Mac Smit. But is the new guy as great as he seems to be?
episodes.title: The New Jerry

episodes.synopsis: The girls' Hawaiian vacation is cut short by a crazed scientist named Hephaestus, who's taken control of the world's volcanoes.
episodes.title: Get Away

episodes.synopsis: While the girls investigate blobs that are erasing the minds of the world's leading scientists, one of the creatures attacks Sam.
episodes.title: The Eraser

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Clover and Alex find themselves targeted when a deranged former cover girl starts kidnapping models for sinister purposes.
episodes.title: Model Citizens

episodes.synopsis: When the girls are framed for robbing a bank, they must dodge the entire WOOHP agency while trying to clear their names and find the real culprits.
episodes.title: The Fugitives

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Clover and Alex travel to Paris, where a number of Nobel Prize winners have disappeared from a conference.
episodes.title: Abductions

episodes.synopsis: The girls track down a crazed toymaker who's making adults act like children. Meanwhile, Clover changes her wardrobe to impress a senior.
episodes.title: Child's Play

episodes.synopsis: When Sam, Clover and Alex go undercover at Silicon Valley High School to investigate attacks by machines, the trail leads them to a bullied genius.
episodes.title: Silicon Valley Girls

episodes.synopsis: When an Olympic athlete and other contestants go missing from a popular game show, the girls go on the show themselves to investigate.
episodes.title: Spy Gladiators

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Alex and a miniaturized Clover attempt to stop tiny madman Diminutive Smalls and his siblings from shrinking the world's landmarks.
episodes.title: Shrinking

episodes.synopsis: When random people (and Alex) are abducted by what may be extraterrestrials, the girls run afoul of a secret organization.
episodes.title: Aliens

episodes.synopsis: When world leaders begin turning national landmarks into thrill rides, the spies uncover a crazed animatronics designer's sinister plot.
episodes.title: Man or Machine

episodes.synopsis: When a cruise ship and its 200 passengers vanish, the team's investigation leads to a strange island where Clover is turned into a human-cat hybrid.
episodes.title: Wild Style

episodes.synopsis: When a top cheerleading squad disappears, the girls encounter the Black Widows, whose routine is strangely similar to that of the missing team.
episodes.title: The Black Widows

episodes.synopsis: Passion Patties, the Happy Girl Scouts' addictive new cookies, make anyone who eats them obese -- and Clover falls victim to their tastiness.
episodes.title: Passion Patties

episodes.synopsis: While pursuing a strange figure who has kidnapped military scientists, the girls are transported back in time to the year 1136.
episodes.title: Stuck in the Middle Ages with You

episodes.synopsis: Sam's infatuation with an exchange student from London distracts her from the team's investigation into a missing invisibility formula.
episodes.title: Evil Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: The spies must stop a villainous video-game designer who's kidnapping extreme sports athletes and converting them into digital characters.
episodes.title: Game Girls

episodes.synopsis: Plotting to freeze Earth's core to eradicate humanity, the nefarious Dr. Gelee takes Clover hostage when confronted by the spies.
episodes.title: Ice Man Cometh

episodes.synopsis: When the girls run into trouble during an investigation, they're rescued by a similar team believed to be killed in action years before.
episodes.title: Spy vs. Spy

episodes.synopsis: As the girls race to find an art thief who can literally make paintings vanish before he strikes again, Alex disappears, too.
episodes.title: Do You Believe in Magic?

episodes.synopsis: When students start turning into old people, the girls trace the cause to an 800-year-old diary and a principal with a diabolical secret.
episodes.title: The Soul Collector

episodes.synopsis: When people around the world vanish after entering stores, Sam is brainwashed as part of a plot to destroy malls.
episodes.title: Malled

episodes.synopsis: The spies come to the rescue when a man named Marco Lumière abducts a pair of movie stars to appear in his all-too-real action film.
episodes.title: A Spy Is Born
